comments: Entry in row n and column k is also the number of multiples of k less than or equal to n, n,k >= 1. - _L. Edson Jeffery_, Aug 31 2014
mathematica: (* Array version: *)Grid[Table[Floor[n/k], {n, 14}, {k, 14}]] (* _L. Edson Jeffery_, Aug 31 2014 *)(* Array antidiagonals flattened: *)Flatten[Table[Floor[(n - k + 1)/k], {n, 14}, {k, n}]] (* _L. Edson Jeffery_, Aug 31 2014 *)
crossrefs: Cf. A010766 (same sequence as triangle, omitting the zeros).
author: _David W. Wilson_
